description: Selise Blocks Documentation - MCP-optimized metadata for AI-driven development

topics.title: Project Setup - Complete Workflow
topics.read_when: Starting new Selise Blocks project
warnings: MUST create local repository (NOT optional)
MUST call set_application_domain after create_project
Ask for requirements BEFORE authentication

topics.title: Implementation Checklist
topics.read_when: BEFORE writing any implementation code
warnings: Never skip this checklist
Verify all prerequisites before coding

topics.title: Development Workflow
topics.read_when: During implementation or when git workflow unclear
warnings: Update TASKS.md immediately when starting/completing tasks
Update SCRATCHPAD.md continuously
Commit after EVERY task completion

topics.title: GraphQL CRUD Operations
topics.read_when: ALWAYS (for data operations)
warnings: CRITICAL: Use lowercase 'get' prefix (getTodoTasks NOT TodoTasks)
DateTime must be ISO format: new Date().toISOString()
Pagination is 1-based (pageNo: 1 for first page)
Filter uses _id NOT ItemId
Response needs extraction: result.data?.X || result.X

topics.title: React Query Hooks Patterns
topics.read_when: When creating hooks or implementing queries/mutations
warnings: MUST use useGlobalQuery and useGlobalMutation wrappers
Include userId in queryKey for multi-user data isolation

topics.title: Schema Design Guide
topics.read_when: Before creating schemas or planning data model
warnings: Auto-generated fields: ItemId, CreatedDate, etc. - DO NOT add manually
Use PascalCase for schema fields
Use _id for MongoDB filtering (NOT ItemId)

topics.title: Component Import Rules
topics.read_when: Before importing components or creating new components
warnings: FORBIDDEN: Never import from other modules (modules/inventory/*)
REQUIRED: Use @/ prefix for ALL imports

topics.title: Confirmation Modal Patterns Recipe
topics.read_when: When implementing delete or destructive actions
warnings: ALWAYS use ConfirmationModal component
Never create custom confirmation dialogs
Never use browser confirm() or alert-dialog for confirmations

topics.title: React Hook Form Integration Recipe
topics.read_when: When building forms
warnings: Always use React Hook Form with Zod validation
Use Form components from UI layer
Don't mix different form libraries

topics.title: IAM to Business Data Mapping
topics.read_when: Multi-user apps requiring user authentication
warnings: Simple apps: Use IAM itemId directly (NO User schema needed)
Complex apps: User schema with IAMUserId field (NOT email)
NEVER use email as foreign key (can change, performance issues)

decision_tree.question: Do users need data beyond name/email from IAM?
decision_tree.no: Use IAM itemId directly - no User schema
decision_tree.yes: Create User schema with IAMUserId reference

topics.title: Permissions and Roles
topics.read_when: Role-based access control needed (admin panels, etc.)
warnings: NOT needed for simple multi-user apps (where all users equal)
Only needed for role-based access control

topics.title: Component Quick Reference
topics.read_when: When looking for specific components or patterns
warnings: Always check this before creating custom components

topics.title: Selise Component Hierarchy
topics.read_when: When planning components or deciding architecture
warnings: Always follow 3-layer rule: Feature → Block → UI
Never import business logic across features
Use Feature components when exact match exists
Use Block components for patterns
Use UI components as foundation

topics.title: Selise Constructs Structure
topics.read_when: when building the frontend and everything else, always read this this
warnings: This is reference only - use these components and reusable code as often as possible. dont copy inventory directly

topics.title: Architecture Patterns
topics.read_when: When planning features or deciding component structure
warnings: Inventory is STRUCTURE ONLY - never copy data patterns
Use graphql-crud.md for data operations
Follow exact folder structure from inventory

topics.title: Common Pitfalls
topics.read_when: BEFORE committing code - final quality check
warnings: Read this before EVERY commit
Check all anti-patterns before pushing code

topics.title: Selise Development Agent Instructions
topics.read_when: For comprehensive development guidelines and best practices
warnings: Always use MCP for schema management
Follow 3-layer hierarchy strictly

topics.title: App Sidebar Component
topics.read_when: When implementing application navigation sidebar with collapsible menu
warnings: Requires SidebarProvider context wrapper
Uses menuItems constant for navigation - define menu structure first
Auto-collapses on mobile route changes
topics.note: Documentation not yet available. See component code in codebase or check list_sections for usage.

topics.title: Base Password Form Component
topics.read_when: When implementing password creation, reset, or change forms with validation
warnings: Requires React Hook Form and Zod validation schema
CAPTCHA integration requires VITE_CAPTCHA_SITE_KEY and VITE_CAPTCHA_TYPE env vars
Navigates to /success after submission - ensure route exists
topics.note: Documentation not yet available. See component code in codebase or check list_sections for usage.

topics.title: Captcha Component
topics.read_when: When implementing bot protection or verification with Google reCAPTCHA or hCaptcha
warnings: Requires site key configuration
Supports only reCaptcha-v2-checkbox and hCaptcha types
Type prop is required - throws error if not provided
topics.note: Documentation not yet available. See component code in codebase or check list_sections for usage.

topics.title: Confirmation Modal Component
topics.read_when: When implementing user confirmations for destructive or important actions
warnings: ALWAYS use this component for confirmations - don't create custom ones
Auto-closes after confirm unless preventAutoClose is true
High z-index (z-[100]) - ensure no conflicts with other modals
topics.note: Documentation not yet available. See component code in codebase or check list_sections for usage.

topics.title: Custom Avatar Component
topics.read_when: When displaying user avatars with fallback initials and optional grid background
warnings: RECOMMENDED: Use CustomAvatar instead of basic Avatar component
Falls back to first character of name if no image provided
Grid background can be disabled with showGrid prop
topics.note: Documentation not yet available. See component code in codebase or check list_sections for usage.

topics.title: Custom Checkbox Component
topics.read_when: When implementing checkbox inputs in forms with consistent styling
warnings: Use this instead of ui-kit/checkbox for consistent form styling
Currently has hardcoded id='terms' - may need unique IDs for multiple checkboxes
topics.note: Documentation not yet available. See component code in codebase or check list_sections for usage.

topics.title: Custom Pagination Email Component
topics.read_when: When implementing simple pagination with range display (1-10 of 50 style)
warnings: Designed for email-type interfaces - use data-table pagination for complex tables
Manages internal page state - ensure proper sync with parent component
topics.note: Documentation not yet available. See component code in codebase or check list_sections for usage.

topics.title: Custom Text Editor Component
topics.read_when: When implementing rich text editing with Quill editor
warnings: Requires Quill library installation (quill/dist/quill.snow.css)
Editor content is HTML - sanitize if displaying user-generated content
topics.note: Documentation not yet available. See component code in codebase or check list_sections for usage.

topics.title: Data Table Component
topics.read_when: When implementing complex tables with pagination, sorting, filtering, and column visibility
warnings: Requires @tanstack/react-table library
Use this for advanced tables - use ui-kit/table for simple tables
Supports both client-side and server-side pagination via manualPagination prop
Mobile view requires mobileColumns configuration for proper display
topics.note: Documentation not yet available. See component code in codebase or check list_sections for usage.

topics.title: Divider Component
topics.read_when: When implementing horizontal dividers with centered text labels
topics.note: Documentation not yet available. See component code in codebase or check list_sections for usage.

topics.title: Dynamic Breadcrumb Component
topics.read_when: When implementing auto-generated breadcrumbs from URL path
warnings: Requires DYNAMIC_BREADCRUMB_TITLES constant for custom segment labels
Hidden on small screens (responsive)
Use breadcrumbIndex prop to skip initial path segments
topics.note: Documentation not yet available. See component code in codebase or check list_sections for usage.

topics.title: Error Alert Component
topics.read_when: When displaying error messages with auto-dismiss functionality
warnings: Auto-dismisses after 5 seconds
Triggered by isError boolean prop
topics.note: Documentation not yet available. See component code in codebase or check list_sections for usage.

topics.title: Extension Banner Component
topics.read_when: When displaying promotional banner for browser extension on login page
warnings: Only displays on /login route
Only visible on specific domains (construct.seliseblocks.com, stg, dev)
Hardcoded Chrome Web Store link
topics.note: Documentation not yet available. See component code in codebase or check list_sections for usage.

topics.title: Loading Overlay Component
topics.read_when: When implementing full-screen loading indicator
warnings: Fixed position covering entire screen (z-50)
Blocks all interactions when visible
topics.note: Documentation not yet available. See component code in codebase or check list_sections for usage.

topics.title: Logo Section Component
topics.read_when: When implementing logo display in sidebar with theme and responsive support
warnings: Requires theme provider context
Shows different logos for expanded/collapsed and light/dark states
topics.note: Documentation not yet available. See component code in codebase or check list_sections for usage.

topics.title: Menu Icon Component
topics.read_when: When mapping icon names to Lucide icons for menu items
warnings: Limited to predefined icon set - add new icons to iconMap
topics.note: Documentation not yet available. See component code in codebase or check list_sections for usage.

topics.title: Menu Section Component
topics.read_when: When implementing categorized menu sections in sidebar
topics.note: Documentation not yet available. See component code in codebase or check list_sections for usage.

topics.title: Notification Component
topics.read_when: When implementing notification center with real-time updates
warnings: Requires @seliseblocks/notifications package
Needs VITE_X_BLOCKS_KEY and VITE_API_BASE_URL env vars
Uses WebSocket subscriptions for real-time updates
topics.note: Documentation not yet available. See component code in codebase or check list_sections for usage.

topics.title: OTP Input Component
topics.read_when: When implementing OTP or verification code input fields
warnings: Requires react-otp-input library
Default is 6 inputs - configure with numInputs prop
topics.note: Documentation not yet available. See component code in codebase or check list_sections for usage.

topics.title: Password Input Component
topics.read_when: When implementing password input fields with visibility toggle
warnings: Forwards ref for form library integration
topics.note: Documentation not yet available. See component code in codebase or check list_sections for usage.

topics.title: Password Strength Checker Component
topics.read_when: When implementing password strength visualization with requirement checklist
warnings: Requirements: 8-30 chars, uppercase, lowercase, number, special char (@$!%*?&)
Percentage-based scoring (0-100%)
topics.note: Documentation not yet available. See component code in codebase or check list_sections for usage.

topics.title: Phone Input Component
topics.read_when: When implementing international phone number input with country selection
warnings: Requires react-phone-number-input library and styles
Includes custom CSS file phone-input.css
topics.note: Documentation not yet available. See component code in codebase or check list_sections for usage.

topics.title: Profile Menu Component
topics.read_when: When implementing user profile dropdown with account options and logout
warnings: Requires useAuthStore and useGetAccount hooks
Includes theme toggle functionality
Handles logout with API call
topics.note: Documentation not yet available. See component code in codebase or check list_sections for usage.

topics.title: Sidebar Menu Item Component
topics.read_when: When implementing individual sidebar menu items with nested children support
warnings: Supports nested children with collapsible sub-menus
Auto-expands when child route is active
topics.note: Documentation not yet available. See component code in codebase or check list_sections for usage.

topics.title: Shared Password Strength Checker Component
topics.read_when: When implementing password strength checker with current password exclusion
warnings: Supports excluding current password (useful for password change forms)
Uses usePasswordStrength hook
topics.note: Documentation not yet available. See component code in codebase or check list_sections for usage.

topics.title: Accordion Component
topics.read_when: When implementing collapsible content sections like FAQs or expandable panels
topics.note: Documentation not yet available. See component code in codebase or check list_sections for usage.

topics.title: Alert Dialog Component
topics.read_when: When implementing alerts or warnings that need user acknowledgment (not confirmations)
warnings: For confirmations and destructive actions, use ConfirmationModal component instead
Includes action and cancel buttons

topics.title: Avatar Component (Basic)
topics.read_when: When implementing basic avatar/profile pictures without grid backgrounds
warnings: PREFER custom-avatar component instead - has more features (grid backgrounds, better fallbacks)

usage_notes.read_order: Numbers indicate mandatory reading sequence for critical docs
usage_notes.triggers: Keywords that should trigger reading this topic
usage_notes.use_cases: Comma-separated keywords for discovery and search
usage_notes.required: true = always read, false = optional, conditional = depends on project type
usage_notes.warnings: Critical anti-patterns and mistakes to avoid
usage_notes.next_steps: Suggested MCP tools or topics to read next
usage_notes.replaces: What this doc replaces (prevents using wrong patterns)

workflow_summary.step_2: get_documentation(['project-setup']) - Get complete workflow (merged from user-interaction + feature-planning)
workflow_summary.step_3: Follow project-setup workflow - Gather requirements and plan
